ocr_qa.question: What is the sheet title printed in the title block?
ocr_qa.answer: Main Building Basement Level 1 Stall Size Plan
evidence: In the title block, under 'Title', the text reads: 'Main Building Basement Level 1 Stall Size Plan'.

ocr_qa.question: What sheet number is shown for this drawing?
evidence: The bottom of the title block shows the sheet number as 'P-8.09'.

ocr_qa.question: What is the drawing scale indicated in the title block?
evidence: The 'Scale @ Arch E1' field in the title block reads '1"=64''.

spatial_qa.question: Where on the sheet is the legend describing the parking space types located?
spatial_qa.answer: In the upper-left portion of the drawing area.
evidence: The colored legend with 'Basement Level 01: 1,140 Parking spaces' appears in the upper-left corner of the grey background.

spatial_qa.question: Where is the main title block located on the sheet?
spatial_qa.answer: Along the right edge near the lower-right corner.
evidence: The vertical title block containing 'Apple Inc.', 'Apple Campus 2', and the sheet title is placed on the right-hand side, extending down to the lower-right corner.

counting_qa.question: How many total parking spaces are provided on Basement Level 01 according to the legend?
evidence: The legend heading reads: 'Basement Level 01: 1,140 Parking spaces'.

counting_qa.question: How many Standard parking spaces are indicated in the legend?
evidence: The first legend line with the cyan color reads: '394 Standard parking spaces (8'-6" x 18'-0")'.

counting_qa.question: How many Accessible parking spaces and Electrical charging stations are indicated in the legend?
counting_qa.answer: 21 Accessible parking spaces and 270 Electrical charging stations
evidence: The dark blue legend entry reads: '21 Accessible parking spaces (9'-0" x 18'-0")'.
The green legend entry reads: 'Electrical charging stations 270 (included in Standard and Compact spaces)'.

counting_qa.question: How many consulting firms are included on this floor plan?
evidence: Foster + Partners, Arup, OLIN, and KIER & WRIGHT.

comparison_qa.question: Which quadrant has no internal ramps?
comparison_qa.answer: The 3rd quadrant or the bottom left quadrant.
evidence: The 3rd quadrant has no internal ramps which is represented with an orange color.

comparison_qa.question: Which quadrant has more internal ramps?
comparison_qa.answer: The 1st quadrant or the top right quadrant.
evidence: The 1st quadrant has two internal ramps which is represented with an orange color.
